algorithm_technique: Use bitmasks to represent colors on rods, count rods with all three bits set.
problem_summary_simple: Count rods that have at least one ring of each color (red, green, blue).
problem_summary_technical: Utilize bitmasks to track colors on each rod; count rods where all three color bits are set.
key_insights: Each rod can be represented by a bitmask where each bit corresponds to a color (R, G, B).
Iterate through the input string, updating the bitmask for the corresponding rod. A rod has all three colors if its bitmask is 0b111 (7).
